title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
description: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example should be disabled to prevent confusion as they currently do not have any effect.
OB: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect on the displayed image. This can mislead users, especially when viewing small images like icons.
EB: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example should be disabled to prevent confusion as they currently do not have any effect.
SR:
1. Build F2 (20020602)
2. OS: Redhat 7.2
3. Environment: GTK2KDE 2.210(GTK2 only)
4. Open the ImageAnalyzer example
5. Notice that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect on the displayed image
6. This issue is particularly noticeable when opening small images, such as icons
